metadata.title: CVE-2023-51774 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: The json-jwt (aka JSON::JWT) gem 1.16.3 for Ruby sometimes allows bypass ofidentity checks via a sign/encryption confusion attack. For example, JWEcan sometimes be used to bypass JSON::JWT.decode.

criterions.comment: ruby-json-jwt package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
